title: GET_FUEL_CONSUMPTION_STATE
content:
0x9B4F5E// GetFuelConsumptionState
bool GET_FUEL_CONSUMPTION_STATE(Vehicle vehicle);Returns whether fuel consumption is enabled for the specified vehicle.
codeBlocks:
-- Example usage for GET_FUEL_CONSUMPTION_STATE
local veh = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if GetFuelConsumptionState(veh) then
    SetVehicleFuelLevel(veh, 100.0)
end
